title: Assign Resource to {studentName}
validationErrorResource: Please select a resource to assign.
validationErrorStudentNotFoundDetailed: Student with ID '{studentId}' not found or invalid.
validationErrorStudentNotStudent: The selected user is not a student.
validationErrorResourceNotFoundInLearnin: Resource with ID '{resourceId}' not found in the learning resources list.
validationErrorAssignerNotFoundDetailed: Assigning user with ID '{assignerId}' not found or invalid.
authErrorUserNotLoaded: Authentication error: User information could not be loaded. Please try again.
authErrorUserNotLoadedForFetch: Authentication error: User information could not be loaded to fetch resources. Please try again.
foreignKeyViolation: Assignment Error: One of the IDs (student, resource, or assigner) is invalid.
